statusDetailed.created: Quiz created and ready to start content extraction
statusDetailed.extracting_content: Extracting and cleaning content from Canvas pages. This may take a few minutes depending on the amount of content.
statusDetailed.generating_questions: Generating questions using the language model. This process typically takes 2-5 minutes.
statusDetailed.exporting_to_canvas: Exporting quiz to Canvas. This includes creating the quiz and adding all approved questions.

canvas_export_error.title: Export to Canvas Failed
canvas_export_error.message: There was an error exporting your quiz to Canvas. Review any questions that may be failing and try exporting again.

content_extraction_error.title: Content Extraction Failed
content_extraction_error.message: Unable to extract content from the selected Canvas modules. Please check your module selection and try again.

no_content_found.title: No Content Found
no_content_found.message: No content was found in the selected Canvas modules. Please select different modules or check if the modules contain content.

llm_generation_error.title: Question Generation Failed
llm_generation_error.message: Unable to generate questions from the extracted content. Please try again or adjust your quiz settings.

no_questions_generated.title: No Questions Generated
no_questions_generated.message: No questions could be generated from the available content. Please try with different content or adjust your quiz settings.

network_error.title: Network Error
network_error.message: A network error occurred while processing your quiz. Please check your connection and try again.

validation_error.title: Validation Error
validation_error.message: There was a validation error while processing your quiz. Please check your quiz settings and try again.

generic.title: Quiz Processing Failed
generic.message: An error occurred while processing your quiz. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

extraction.title: Content Extraction
extraction.pending: Waiting to extract content from selected Canvas modules
extraction.processing: Extracting and processing content from Canvas modules...
extraction.completed: Content successfully extracted from Canvas modules
extraction.failed: Content extraction failed. Please check your module selection and try again.

generation.title: Question Generation
generation.pending: Waiting for content extraction to complete
generation.processing: AI is generating multiple-choice questions from extracted content...
generation.completed: Questions generated successfully and ready for review
generation.partial: Some questions generated successfully - retry available for remaining questions
generation.failed: Question generation failed. This may be due to insufficient content or AI service issues.

export.title: Canvas Export
export.pending: Waiting for questions to be reviewed and approved
export.processing: Exporting approved questions to Canvas as a new quiz...
export.failed: Canvas export failed. Please check your Canvas permissions and try again.

language.label: Quiz Language
language.description: Select the language for question generation

tone.label: Tone of Voice
tone.description: Select the tone for question generation
tone.academicDescription: Use formal academic language with precise terminology
tone.casualDescription: Use everyday conversational language that feels approachable
tone.encouragingDescription: Use warm, supportive language with helpful hints embedded in questions
tone.professionalDescription: Use clear, direct business language for workplace training

questionTypeDescriptions.multiple_choice: Choose the correct answer from 4 options (A, B, C, D)
questionTypeDescriptions.matching: Match questions to their correct answers

questionSelector.title: Select Question Type
questionSelector.description: Choose the type of question you want to create.

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete Quiz
deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete the quiz "{{quizTitle}}"? This action cannot be undone.

detail.notFoundMessage: The quiz you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.

generationTrigger.partialMessage: Some questions were generated successfully. Click below to retry generating the remaining {{count}} questions.
generationTrigger.failedMessage: The previous question generation attempt failed. Click below to retry generating {{count}} multiple-choice questions.

questions.title: Question {{number}}
questions.noQuestionsDescription: Questions will appear here once the generation process is complete.
questions.loadFailedDescription: There was an error loading the questions for this quiz.
questions.notAvailableDescription: Questions will appear here once the generation process is complete.
questions.reviewDescription: Review and approve each question individually. You can edit any question before approving it.
questions.allApprovedSwitch: All questions have been approved! Switch to "All Questions" to see them.
questions.noMatchFilter: No questions match the current filter.

stats.allReviewed: All questions have been reviewed and approved!
stats.exportedSuccess: Quiz has been successfully exported to Canvas
stats.noQuestionsYet: No questions generated yet. Questions will appear here once generation is complete.
stats.exportStarted: Quiz export to Canvas started successfully

editor.pairsRequirement: At least 3 pairs required, maximum 10 pairs allowed.
editor.distractorsDescription: Optional incorrect answers that don't match any question. Maximum 5 allowed.
editor.blankHelperText: Use [blank_1], [blank_2], etc. to mark blanks in your question
editor.addBlankDisabledText: Add question text first to enable smart blank creation
